---
title: "Illustrating the Central Limit Theorem"
author: "Student"
date: "August 19, 2015"
output: html_document
---

```{r play}
  # Load data.
  library(data.table)
  data(ToothGrowth)

  # Calculate mean and sample sd.
  tg <- ToothGrowth[, .(mean = mean(len), sd = sd(len), n = length(len)), by = .(supp, dose)]
  
  # 
  tg.vc <- tg[supp == "VC"]
```
